attributes.action: give the English people a chance to be rid of you and call a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people have spoken at the recent local elections and the by-elections. If the Government realy are 'listening' and respect the will of the people I invite them to have the honour and moral courage to call an election rather than clinging to power for as long as legally possible against the apparent will of the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
